chapter.para: This chapter describes the graphical user interface (GUI) in some detail.

note.para: qdmr aims at being a device and manufacturer independent CPS. To this end, the GUI reflects a device independent codeplug. This means, that not all of the shown features are present in all radios. For example, not all supported devices implement APRS or roaming. These settings are then ignored when generating the device specific binary codeplug.
